Reference

CP - Class Probability

CP (Class Probability) refers to outlier scores based on (probabilistic) discriminative classifiers.

cp_at()

Dataset Shift via Class Probabilities

cp_pt()

Dataset Shift via Class Probabilities

cp_ss()

Dataset Shift via Class Probabilities

OD - Outlier Detection

OD (Outlier Detection) refers to outlier scores based on outlier detection.

od_pt()

Dataset Shift via Isolation Scores

RUE - Resampling Uncertainty

RUE (Resampling Uncertainty) refers to outlier scores based on resampling uncertainty.

rue_pt()

Dataset Shift via Resampling (Prediction) Uncertainty

RD - Residual diagnostic

RD (Residual Diagnostic) refers to outlier scores based on residuals.

rd_pt()

Dataset Shift via Residuals

Plot

Plotting functions.

plot(<outlier.test>)

Plot the result of the D-SOS test.

Test Statistic

Compute specified test statistic.

wauc_from_os()

Weighted AUC from Outlier Scores
